Classes

struct  UMBRAMesh

Detailed Description

This class is the base class for terrain blocks used in the client and tools.

The server uses BaseTerrainBlock as the base class. This class implements rendering interfaces and terrain hole map interfaces.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void Terrain::BaseRenderTerrainBlock::cacheCurrentLighting ( bool  cacheSpecular = true  )  [pure virtual]

This function stores the current ambient, directional, and (optionally) specular lighting state so this block can defer rendering correctly.

Parameters:
cacheSpecular Cache specular lighting, defaults to true.

Implemented in Terrain::TerrainBlock1, and Terrain::TerrainBlock2.
